column1: short in length, goes back and defends it back to bowler
fuller in length, on middle and leg stump, worked away to backward square leg for a quick single
good length ball on off stump, pushes to covers
fuller in length, on off stump, drives to mid-off
full and bit wide outside off, drives on the up and excellent stop at covers
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to cover
fuller in length, on middle and leg, drives down the ground to mid-on
short in length, on leg stump, turned to square leg
short in length, on leg stump, turned away down to fine leg for a single
good length on off stump, goes back and defends it back to bowler
again back of length, goes back and pushes to off side, wants a single, sent back by Imam
overpitched on middle and leg stump, nicely clipped away off his legs and finds the gap between mid-on and midwicket for four
on middle and leg stump, turned away to leg side
fuller in length, on off stump, pushes to cover
again full on off stump, drives to mid-off
full ball, on off stump, pushes to off side
short in length, on middle and leg stump, defends it back to bowler
good length ball, on off stump, nips back a bit, tries to cut that one, hits the inner part of the bat and goes to short cover
fuller in length, on off stump, comes well forward and defends to mid-off
again fuller in length, on off stump, gets well forward and angles it to gully
on wrong line, pitches on leg stump, Imam flicks it away down to fine leg fence for four, easy picking!
good length ball, on off stump and moves awy, Imam covers the line of the off stump and lets it go
again lovely delivery, pitches on off stump and angling across the left hander, Imam tries to push at it and gets beaten
full ball, on off stump, drives to mid-off and goes for a quick single, mid off fielder picks up and missed the stump, Imam gets one extra as back up was poor
on middle and leg stump, worked away to backward square leg for a single
full ball, on middle and leg stump, drives down the ground to mid-on
short in length, outside off and left alone
short ball, on leg stump, pulled away to deep square leg
Another short ball, this time Abid pulls it away over midwicket for four
Gone! Full ball, on middle and leg stump, tries to play across the line, misses it and pays the price, caught plumb in front, loud shout for lbw and up goes the finger of Ahsan Raza
short in length, on leg stump tucks it away to leg side, wnts a single, sent back by skipper with a loud NO
full ball, on off stump, gets forward and behind the line, defends it to mid-off
full and drifting down the leg side through to keeper for a wide
back of length, nips back a bit, Imam jumps up and defends it to leg side
That is a cracking shot! Full and just outside off, leans into it and drives on the up in the gap at covers for four
full on target, defends it back to bowler
again on target, goes back and defends it to leg side, bowler stop it with his foot
full and down the leg side through to keeper for a wide
That is typicall Babar Azam! Full ball, on off stump, leans well forward and drive in the gap between mid-off and extra cover and gets off the mark in style
back of length, outside off goes back and punches to point
full on middle stump, Babar defends it to leg side
again full ball, on off stump, gets forward and defends with full face of the bat back to bowler
short in length, nips back a bit, Babar stands tall and defends to off side
Overpitched on middle and leg stump, Babar played a lovely on drive with of mid-on fielder for four
short in length, outside off, Imam punches it to point and good sliding save by fielder
full ball, on target, drives down the ground to mid-on, Babar wants a run, sent back by Imam
lovely delivery, pitches on off stump and moves away with some extra bounce, Imam tries to defend, misses the edge on the way to keeper
short in length, wide outside off and moves away, Imam tries to cut and beaten again
That's four! Full on off stump, Imam this time drives down the ground and no chance for mid-on fielder to stop that one
good length ball, on leg stump, turned away down to fine leg
fuller in length, on off stump, driven towards sweeper cover for a single
short in length, outside off, cuts it down to backward point, good pick up and throw by third man fielder
short in length, Imam pulls it away in the air but well short of deep midwicket fielder
on middle and leg stump, works away towards backward square leg and back for 2nd run
full on middle and leg stump, turned away to deep square leg for a single
good length ball, on off stump, moves away, tries to defend, edges it down to third man fence for four
Back of length, Babar stands tall and punches it away in the gap at covers, fielder chases hard but in vain
fuller in length, on off stump, gets right behind it and defends it back to bowler
full ball, on middle stump, driven to mid-on
on middle and leg stump, clipped away towards deep square leg for a single
good length ball, on off stump, angles it down to third man for an easy single
good length ball, on off stump, angles it down to third man for a single
short ball, pulled away towards midwicket for a single
full and down the leg side for a wide
good length ball, on off stump, angles it down to third man for a single
again good length ball, outside off, this time Babar opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
from round the wicket, angling in, Imam works it away down to fine leg for a single
full ball, on off stump, drives on the up but does not find the gap at covers
short in length, on off stump, angles it down to third man
That is a big big wicket! Full and bit wide outside off, moves away a bit, Babar tries to drive away from the body and gets the outside edge in the gloves of Taylor
short ball with some pace and bounce, Haris sways away and lets it go through to keeper
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to square leg
again good length ball, pitches on middle stump and gets extra bounce, Haris defends it with one hand off the bat

short in length, on leg stump, Shaheen glances it away down to fine leg fence for four

Short ball, Imad goes for the pull shot, hits it well and Williams at deep square leg, takes the catch and went over the fence, tried to throw the ball inside the play area, tv replay confirms that is a six
low full toss, comes down the wicket and slices it away over point for four

good length ball, just outside off and left alone
